name: Barong
description: Barong is a Large celestial being with impressive physical prowess and formidable magical abilities, showcasing a majestic appearance that embodies lawfulness and goodness.
memorable: Barong's Aura of Protection grants allies a significant bonus to saving throws, and its ability to summon other good-aligned creatures adds tactical versatility in combat.
goals: To serve as a protector and ally to those in need, promoting goodness and lawfulness.
relations: May encounter or serve alongside other celestial beings and good-aligned spirits.
environment: Typically found in celestial realms or places of great good, often in the company of allies.
strengths: Possesses high ability scores, particularly in Strength and Constitution; has damage immunities and resistances, making it very durable in combat.
weaknesses: Not specified, but as a celestial being may face challenges from evil-aligned creatures and magic.
attacks: Barong attacks with a bite and claw, both of which deliver magical damage along with significant radiant damage.
most_powerful_ability: Aura of Protection provides a +6 bonus to saving throws for all allies within 30 feet.
senses: Barong has truesight up to 120 feet, allowing it to see through illusions and detect hidden foes.
skills: Barong has exceptional skills in insight, perception, and persuasion, all rated at +12, enhancing its awareness and effectiveness in interactions.
additional_information: Has resistance to nonmagical damage and immunity to charmed, exhaustion, and frightened conditions.
Magic Resistance gives it advantage on saving throws against spells.
Pack Tactics enhances its combat effectiveness with allies.
Possesses a Summon Spirit ability to call upon various good-aligned creatures for assistance.
Can use legendary actions to enhance its combat and support capabilities.
